hed: The 2021 Montana Legislature: The MTFP guide

description.value: The Montana House does XXX. It has 100 representatives elected to two-year terms, each representing a specific house district. Budget bills are supposed to start here.
1-2 grafs more w/ high school civics info.
The Montana Senate does XXX. It has 50 senators, each representing a specific senate district. It’s kind of stuffy over there.
1-2 grafs more w/ high school civics info.
Gov. Greg Gianforte, elected last fall, took office in early 2021 as Montana’s first Republican governor since 2005. TRUE CONSERVATIVE RULE now.
1-2 grafs more about governor’s powers, high school civics type info.

annotation.value: Galt is speaker of the house.
This is a second graf discussing his biography.
Jones is a longtime lawmaker who has played a central role in crafting the state budget for XXXX. Solutions Caucus yada yada.
This is the primary state budget bill.
